rs-rabbitmq/logdir.description: Path to the directory for log files.

rs-rabbitmq/mnesiadir.description: Path to the directory for Mnesia database files.

rs-rabbitmq/cluster_cookie.description: Access cookie for clustering nodes.  There is no default.

rs-rabbitmq/enabled_plugins.description: List all plugins that will be activated for RabbitMQ

rs-rabbitmq/disabled_plugins.description: List all plugins that will be deactivated for RabbitMQ
